fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Punish Rumor: Before the start of the day, choose a person who might get the most votes and be elected first. Anyone who chooses to do so will be severely beaten the following night.

Defender: If you did not guess the first vote yesterday (ie someone voted not to vote or voted for a different person), you are a strong defender, and tomorrow you can hear the voices of two players instead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- In the day, you will hear voices of a player at random, which includes anything they type in their player channel, except for votes.
- This post is based off of a Google misTranslated version of "Amber Heard's Lawyer"
